name: VoidToads
description:
Void Toads is platform fighter, without stamina, percentage or blast zones. The player's goal is to chain together a fixed amount of successive hits to win.

The Game Maker's Tool Kit Game Jam version of the game only contains a sandbag mode, but the game was designed with the mindset of having a Player versus Player environment.

In the sandbag mode, there are varying difficulties, and the more versatile you are with your move set, the more points you will gain.

CONTROLS

Xbox controller:

Move: Joystick
A: Jump, short press: short hop
X: Attack
X + Direction: Directional attack


Keyboard:

WASD: Movement
J: Attack
Space: Select Menu Item
